pages.text: After the $(qi) is fully absorbed into the dantian. The $(qi) is compressed and turned into a liquid form called $(true qi) in the dantian creating a spiritual sea contained within. This spiritual sea will be the foundation of your future strength, so make sure to convert as much $(qi) into $(true qi) as you can before you break through to the next realm.$(br2)Hint - Meditate and gather $(true qi).
